  • Constructor Details

    • AppPacketSource

      public AppPacketSource​(IPHost host, IPAddress dst, int pktLen, PacketGenerator generator)
      Create a new @class AppPacketSource.
      Parameters:
      host - is the IP host running this application.
      dst - is the packets' destination (could be running an instance of @class AppPacketSink).
      pktLen - is the packet length.
      generator - is the packet generator.
